title: transaction growth
reference: "2023 was an outstanding year where we delivered strong transaction growth driven by throughput and menu innovation, opened a record number of new restaurants, surpassed $3 million in AUVs and formed our first international partnership,” said Brian Niccol, Chairman and CEO, Chipotle.

title: Average Unit Volumes (AUVs)
reference: "2023 was an outstanding year where we delivered strong transaction growth driven by throughput and menu innovation, opened a record number of new restaurants, surpassed $3 million in AUVs and formed our first international partnership,” said Brian Niccol, Chairman and CEO, Chipotle.

title: Number of restaurants in North America
reference: “I am more confident than ever that we have the right people and the right strategy to achieve our long-term growth goals of reaching 7,000 restaurants in North America, $4 million in AUVs, expanding our industry leading margins and returns and furthering our purpose of Cultivating a Better World globally.”

title: Average Unit Volumes (AUVs)

title: Increase in comparable restaurant sales
reference: The increase in total revenue was driven by an 8.4% increase in comparable restaurant sales attributable to higher transactions of 7.4% and an increase in average check of 1.0%, and to a lesser extent, new restaurant openings.

title: Increase in transactions
reference: The increase in total revenue was driven by an 8.4% increase in comparable restaurant sales attributable to higher transactions of 7.4% and an increase in average check of 1.0%, and to a lesser extent, new restaurant openings.

reference: Digital sales represented 36.1% of total food and beverage revenue.

title: Food, beverage and packaging costs as a percentage of total revenue
reference: Food, beverage and packaging costs in the fourth quarter were 29.7% of total revenue, an increase of 40 basis points compared to the fourth quarter of 2022.

title: Increase in food, beverage and packaging costs compared to prior year
reference: Food, beverage and packaging costs in the fourth quarter were 29.7% of total revenue, an increase of 40 basis points compared to the fourth quarter of 2022.

title: Restaurant level operating margin
reference: Restaurant level operating margin in the fourth quarter was 25.4% compared to 24.0% in the fourth quarter of 2022.

title: Increase in comparable restaurant sales
reference: The increase in total revenue was driven by a 7.9% increase in comparable restaurant sales attributable to higher transactions of 5.0% and an increase in average check of 2.9% and, to a lesser extent, new restaurant openings.

reference: Digital sales represented 37.4% of total food and beverage revenue.

title: Number of new restaurants opened in 2023
reference: We opened 271 new restaurants during 2023, bringing the total restaurant count at year-end to 3,437.

reference: We opened 271 new restaurants during 2023, bringing the total restaurant count at year-end to 3,437.

reference: We had a total of 811 Chipotlanes as of year-end, which includes conversions of existing restaurants.

title: Food, beverage and packaging costs as a percentage of total revenue
reference: Food, beverage and packaging costs for 2023 were 29.5% of total revenue, a decrease of 60 basis points compared to 2022.

reference: Food, beverage and packaging costs for 2023 were 29.5% of total revenue, a decrease of 60 basis points compared to 2022.

title: Restaurant level operating margin for 2023
reference: Restaurant level operating margin for 2023 was 26.2% compared to 23.9% in 2022.
